TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DesignSurfaceEventHandler(object sender, DesignSurfaceEventArgs e);

remarks.para: When you create a delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. For more information about event handler delegates, see Events and Delegates.

summary.para: Represents the method that will handle the event of a class. This class cannot be inherited.
